mapper.select: SELECT sale_id FROM product_sale ORDER BY sale_id DESC limit 1

SELECT ps.sale_id, ps.sale_cate, ps.sale_name, ps.sale_status, ps.sale_price, MAX(pi.productimg_url) AS productimg_url, MAX(pi.productimg_alias) AS productimg_alias, COUNT(DISTINCT fp.member_id) AS favorite_count FROM product_sale ps LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image pi ON ps.sale_id = pi.sale_id LEFT OUTER JOIN favorite_product fp ON ps.sale_id = fp.sale_id WHERE 1=1
AND ps.sale_area = #{area}
AND ps.sale_cate in ( '디지털' ,'가전제품' )
AND ps.sale_cate in ( '생활/주방용품', '공구/산업용품' , '가구/인테리어' , '식품' )
AND ps.sale_cate in ( '도서/티켓/문구', '예술/희귀/수집품' , '음반/악기' , '스타굿즈' )
AND ps.sale_cate in ( '여성의류', '남성의류' , '신발' , '가방/지갑' , '패션 액세서리' , '쥬얼리' , '스포츠/레저' , '시계')
AND ps.sale_cate in ( '키덜트', '뷰티/미용' , '유아동/출산' , '차량/오토바이' , '반려동물용품' , '기타')
GROUP BY ps.sale_id, ps.sale_cate, ps.sale_name, ps.sale_status, ps.sale_price
